Cixi Beilian Electrical Appliance Co.,LTD
was established in 2011. The company is located in Cixi City, Ningbo, the hometown of home appliances in China, and on the south bank of the Hangzhou Bay Sea-crossing Bridge. Currently, Beilian Electric has developed into a comprehensive industry and trade enterprise with professional equipment such as product research and development, mold development, filter screen manufacturing, plastic injection molding, and finished product assembly, integrating research and development, production, and sales.

R&D department
Since its establishment, the company has been adhering to scientific growth and taking technology R&D and talent training as the company's growth goal The company has set up a special technology R&D department and has a technology R&D team with rich experience and strong innovation ability The company attaches great importance to the R&D of new products or new processes, and has made great investment in R&D every year. There are 50 ~ 80 new products every year, and has obtained excellent results.
Bring User-Oriented Home Appliances of Cixi Beilian
When it comes to home appliances, you must choose Cixi Beilian Electrical Appliance Co., Ltd. Our home appliances meet user-friendly functions with convenience. Consumers can find many options like humidifiers, air fryers, air purifiers, medical appliances, etc. Find a solution to polluted air inside homes and offices in the form of air purifiers. Deal with a dry environment with our humidifiers. If you want instant cooking, get our air fryers. From a clean atmosphere to quick dishes, we cover everything. The patients will find them very useful who have breathing problems.
We Offer Economical Prices to All Global Buyers
You can reach us from anywhere in the world. Our prices are always economical for everyone. We are a wholesale manufacturer who has budget-friendly prices for you. If you are a retailer, it is time to purchase in bulk. The prices will be inexpensive for you. Even if you are a direct consumer, you can contact us for discounts. Our production meets quality and quantity at the same time. This is where a buyer would think about purchasing in large numbers. We offer discounted rates for home appliances to everyone in the world.
What Happens When You Try Cixi Beilian Electrical Appliance?
You can have benefits and lots of benefits. Since we focus on quality, our home appliances have high longevity. By using them, you will get a convenient lifestyle. By using time-saving appliances, you can get peace of mind. Their durability comes from materials that we use for production. That makes them long-running machines with high efficiency. We provide multiple options in our home appliances for the adjustability of multiple elements. It depends on the type of home appliance you use. Each one has a different feature for your convenience.
Why Choose Us?
Choosing Cixi Beilian Electrical Appliance Co., Ltd. will give you multiple advantages. The first is about the unbeatable quality. The second is about the unmatchable prices. Our team of experts focuses on product development through R&D work. Since 2011, we have been manufacturing various types of home appliances. All of them are for international customers who want to avail of the best production. Likewise, our quality inspection team ensures all the home appliances meet the criteria of finest production. This is about the safety of home appliances and consumers.
